## Announcement

Tender No. (M.M.M) 21 for the year (2025/2026) Maintenance of communication devices and provision of communication line subscription service to connect intermediate and secondary schools and other sites to the Ministry's General Office (South Surra) with technical and technical support.

The Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig> announces a general tender under No. (M.M.M) 21 for the year 2025/2026 for the maintenance of communication devices and the provision of communication line subscription service to connect intermediate and secondary schools and other sites to the Ministry's General Office (South Surra / Janoub Al-Surra <orig>جنوب السرة</orig>) with technical and technical support. All works subject to the tender shall be executed in accordance with the general and special conditions, technical specifications, schedule of items, numbers, quantities, and prices within the period specified in the tender documents, and generally in accordance with all provisions contained in the tender documents and the contract to be concluded based thereon.

General Instructions for Bidders:

Companies applying for this tender must have previous experience in this field and possess the capabilities and specialized trained technical workforce to execute the works subject to the tender.

1.  The tender is (general) for bidders approved by the Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig> to execute the works subject to the tender.
2.  It is a condition for those applying for this tender to be specialized companies/establishments (within Kuwait / Al-Kuwait <orig>الكويت</orig>) in executing all works subject to the tender, registered in the Commercial Register and the current Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry / Ghurfat Tijara wa Sina'at Al-Kuwait <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>, and to have
3.  This tender is indivisible and pertains to the execution of all works subject to the tender in accordance with the general and special conditions, technical specifications, schedule of items, numbers, quantities, and prices. Furthermore, the bidder is not entitled to submit alternative offers (bids), as the tender documents do not permit the submission of alternative offers (bids). Therefore, the bidder must adhere to what is stated in the documents of this tender in this regard.
4.  The bidder must submit with their bid an initial security deposit in the amount of K.D. 2,000/000 (Two Thousand Kuwaiti Dinars / Dinar Kuwaiti <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only) in the form of a certified check or an unconditional, irrevocable, and reservation-free letter of guarantee issued by one of the banks accredited by the State of Kuwait / Dawlat Al-Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> in the name and for the benefit of the Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig>. This security must be valid for the duration of the bid's validity. Any bid not accompanied by the full amount of this security will be excluded. Initial security deposits shall not be refunded until (90) days have passed from the tender closing date or when the winning bidder submits the final security and signs the contract, unless the tender is cancelled. The Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig> will not pay any interest on the amount of this security, and the bidder's creditors are not permitted to seize its amount.
5.  The total duration of the contract is (7) months, during which the contractor is committed to executing all works subject to the tender in accordance with the general and special conditions, technical specifications, schedule of items, numbers, quantities, and prices, and in accordance with the general and special conditions, provisions, and technical specifications contained in the tender documents.
6.  The bid shall remain valid and irrevocable from the time of its submission for a period of (90) days from the date of opening the bid envelopes. If it is not possible to decide on the bids within their specified validity period, bidders will be requested to agree to extend the validity of their bids for another similar period at most. Each bidder must agree in writing to the extension, specifying the duration of the initial security, and any bid from a bidder who does not accept the extension of its validity period will be excluded.
7.  If, upon studying the tender, the bidder discovers any error, deficiency, or discrepancy in the technical documents or in the bill of quantities that may affect their bid categories or the value of the works, they must seek clarification from the Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig> before submitting their bid. The Ministry will review these observations and inquiries if they are serious and will answer them during the preliminary meeting, removing any error, deficiency, discrepancy, or conflict (if any), or circulating the clarification and response by means of a letter addressed to each bidder who purchased the tender documents. In this case, the response is considered an integral part of those tender documents, and in all circumstances, this does not entail any additional responsibility or obligation on the Ministry.
8.  Bids shall be deposited in the designated box at the headquarters of the Supplies and Warehouses Department / Idarat Al-Tawridat wal-Makhazin <orig>إدارة التوريدات والمخازن</orig> (South Subhan Area / Mantiqat Subhan Al-Janoubi <orig>منطقة صبحان الجنوبي</orig>) no later than 15 working days, during official working hours and before 12:00 PM on the closing day. No attention will be paid to any bid received after the aforementioned deadline, nor to any change, amendment, or reduction in the prices of submitted bids received after the bid submission.
9.  The financial cost for obtaining a copy of the tender documents is (K.D. 75).
10. A preliminary meeting will be held to answer the inquiries of the bidders at the headquarters of the Supplies and Warehouses Department / Idarat Al-Tawridat wal-Makhazin <orig>إدارة التوريدات والمخازن</orig> (South Subhan Area / Mantiqat Subhan Al-Janoubi <orig>منطقة صبحان الجنوبي</orig>). The date of the meeting will be determined and announced later via the Ministry's official website.
11. The bidder must fill in the attached tables and provide a statement of all necessary supplies for executing the works within the same bid documents they submit. The Ministry reserves the right not to accept the bid unless it includes the filled table in accordance with the public interest, with the necessity of adhering to what is stated in the technical specifications and conditions of the tender.
12. The bidder must submit all banking guarantees related to this tender in Arabic.

Undersecretary of the Ministry of Education / Wizarat Al-Tarbiya <orig>وزارة التربية</orig>## Ministry of Interior / Wizarat Al-Dakhiliya <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig>

The Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig> announces the offering of Practice No. (L.A. 147/2024 – 2025)

(One Thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only) (via K-Net), and submit an initial guarantee of (20,000) K.D. (Twenty Thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only), to be included in the financial bid for the practice. Please note that the final insurance for the practice is 10% of the total contract value. Announcement
The Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig> announces Tender No. (L.A.A.M 25/2025-2026): Supply, delivery, and warranty of various metals for the General Department of Coast Guard <orig>الإدارة العامة لخفر السواحل</orig> – Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig>.
Specialized companies / establishments in this field are requested to refer to the General Department of Financial Affairs <orig>الإدارة العامة للشئون المالية</orig> – Tenders Department <orig>إدارة المناقصات</orig> (Al-Ardiya Industrial Area <orig>العيارضية الصناعية</orig>) to obtain the documents for this practice against a non-refundable fee of (150/- K.D.) only One Hundred and Fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> (via K-NET). An initial guarantee of (4,500/- K.D.) for a period of (90 days) must be submitted (to accompany the bid submitted in the practice), noting that the final insurance for the practice is 10% of the total contract value.
Applicants must bring a copy of the practice announcement from the Official Gazette (Kuwait Today / Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>), and the following documents:
- A valid registration receipt with the Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig>.
Or
- A registration application for registration with the Ministry, followed by the purchase of practice documents.
The closing date (submission of bids) is Wednesday, 2025/10/1 at 1:00 PM. No bids submitted before or after the mentioned time will be accepted. Bids must be submitted to the Envelope Opening Committee <orig>لجنة فض المظاريف</orig> at the Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig> building (Sharq Area <orig>منطقة شرق</orig> – Al-Siddiq School <orig>مدرسة الصديق</orig> – First Floor).
A mandatory preliminary meeting will be held to answer inquiries from participating companies on Wednesday, 2025/9/3 at the Sabah Al-Ahmad Naval Base <orig>قاعدة صباح الأحمد البحرية</orig>, Coast Guard <orig>خفر السواحل</orig> in Fintas <orig>الفنطاس</orig> at 10:00 AM. Any recommendations or decisions resulting from this meeting shall be an integral part of the practice documents and binding on all companies, whether the practitioner attended or did not attend the mandatory preliminary meeting.

Bids must be submitted to the Goods Purchase Envelope Opening Committee <orig>لجنة فض مظاريف شراء السلع</orig> at the Ministry of Interior <orig>وزارة الداخلية</orig> (Sharq Area <orig>منطقة شرق</orig> – Al-Siddiq School <orig>مدرسة الصديق</orig> – First Floor).
A mandatory preliminary meeting will be held with the companies participating in the practice on Wednesday, 2025/8/27 at the headquarters of the General Department of Information Systems <orig>الإدارة العامة لنظم المعلومات</orig> at 10:00 AM to answer companies' inquiries. Any recommendations or decisions resulting from this meeting shall be an integral part of the practice documents and binding on all companies, whether the practitioner attended or did not attend the mandatory preliminary meeting.

## Ministry of Defense <orig>وزارة الدفاع</orig>

Subject: Re-issuance of Tender No. 252-222-4-2411 for the repair and maintenance of equipment, machinery, tools, and devices, including spare parts, for a period of two years (withdrawal as needed).
The Ministry of Defense <orig>وزارة الدفاع</orig> announces the re-issuance of the above-mentioned tender to local companies and establishments specialized in this field for the year 202. This is in accordance with the terms and specifications contained in the tender documents, which can be obtained from the Technical Equipment Department <orig>إدارة التجهيز الفني</orig> – Technical Equipment Control <orig>مراقبة التجهيزات الفنية</orig> during official working hours. # Minutes of the Births and Deaths Committee Meeting
Held on 22/07/2025

After reviewing the requests submitted for amending data in the birth and death records, the Committee decided to publish the data in the Official Gazette (Kuwait Today / Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>). If the Committee does not receive any objection within fifteen days from the date of publication of this announcement, the amendment will be made in the records, and birth or death certificates will be issued for the following amendment:

# Minutes of the Births and Deaths Committee Meeting
No. 2025/20
Held on 22/07/2025

The Births and Deaths Committee / Lajnat Al-Mawalid wal-Wafayat <orig>لجنة المواليد والوفيات</orig>, stipulated in Article 15 of Law No. 36/69 and formed by Ministerial Resolution No. 1650/2021, met.
*   Mr. / Director of the Central Registry of Births and Deaths / Mudir Idarat Al-Sijil Al-Markazi lil-Mawalid wal-Wafayat <orig>مدير إدارة السجل المركزي للمواليد والوفيات</orig>
*   Dr. / Head of the General Medical Council / Ra'is Al-Majlis Al-Tibbi Al-Aam <orig>رئيس المجلس الطبي العام</orig>
*   Mr. / Head of Research and Opinion Section / Ra'is Qism Al-Buhuth wal-Ra'y <orig>رئيس قسم البحوث والرأي</orig>
*   Mr. / Head of Registration Section / Ra'is Qism Al-Qayd <orig>رئيس قسم القيد</orig>
*   Mr. / Head of Deaths Section / Ra'is Qism Al-Wafayat <orig>رئيس قسم الوفيات</orig>
*   Mr. / Legal Researcher / Al-Bahith Al-Qanuni <orig>الباحث القانوني</orig>
*   Mr. / Head of Records Section / Ra'is Qism Al-Sijillat <orig>رئيس قسم السجلات</orig>

Ms. / Alia Al-Saffar <orig>علياء الصفار</orig> acted as the Committee's secretary.
The Committee reviewed requests from No. ((258)) to No. ((270)) in the attached list concerning data amendments in birth and death records for dropped birth and death registrations.
After its review and verification of the completeness of documents and records, the Committee decided to announce the amendments and requests in the Official Gazette (Kuwait Today / Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>) in two consecutive issues, so that if the legal period (fifteen days) from the date of the last announcement expires and no one submits any objection regarding the amendments in the registers, birth and death certificates will be issued.

Fourth: If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction shall be awarded to him, unless someone comes forward in that session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by the deposit of the full auction price. In this case, the auction shall be re-held in the same session based on this price.
Fifth: If the first bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward with a ten percent increase, the auction shall be immediately re-held at his expense based on the price at which it was awarded to him in the previous session. No offer in this session shall be considered unless accompanied by the deposit of its full value. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixth: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the fees for amending the company contract, execution procedure expenses amounting to KWD 200, legal and expert fees, and advertising and publication expenses for the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventh: This announcement of sale is published in accordance with the law and is requested by those directly involved in the sale procedures, at their responsibility, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any liability.
Eighth: Partners have the right to object to the inclusion of the bidder who submitted the best offer within three days from the date the court approves his offer.
Ninth: Any of the partners may – even before the judgment awarding the auction is issued – settle the debt of the debtor partner to the seizing creditor.
Tenth: Partners may – even before the judgment awarding the auction is issued – redeem a sufficient amount of the seized shares to settle the creditor's debt.
Eleventh: In the event that any of the partners objects to the inclusion of the successful bidder in the company, and the company or partners fail to settle the seizing creditor's debt or redeem the shares as previously stated, the Sales Judge <orig>قاضي البيوع</orig> shall issue a judgment for the dissolution and liquidation of the company and the appointment of a liquidator. The judgment issued in this regard shall be subject to appeal in accordance with the law.
Important Notice:

3- Those wishing to participate in the auction should review the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> to examine the company's financial statements as concluded by the expert's report commissioned in the lawsuit, no later than the day preceding the scheduled auction session.

- Valuation of Al-Ittihad Commercial Company (LLC) <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية (ذ.م.م)</orig> using the Discounted Cash Flow method, the Adjusted Book Value method, and the Price-to-Revenue Multiple method. Accordingly, the fair value of equity for Al-Ittihad Commercial Company (LLC) <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية (ذ.م.م)</orig> as of September 30, 2023, amounted to approximately KWD 15,262,000 <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> (fifteen million two hundred sixty-two thousand Kuwaiti Dinars), using a weighted average between the Discounted Cash Flow method, the Adjusted Book Value method, and the Price-to-Revenue Multiple method, with weights of 50%, 25%, and 25% respectively.
- After Al-Ittihad Commercial Company (LLC) <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية (ذ.م.م)</orig> was valued and the fair value of equity for Al-Ittihad Commercial Company (LLC) <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية (ذ.م.م)</orig> was determined on September 30, 2023, at KWD 15,262,000 <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, the fair market value of the share of the heirs of Mr. Daniel Bishr Hasso <orig>دانيال بشر حسو</orig> (the debtor) in the share of Mr. Alan Daniel Bishr Hasso <orig>آلان دانيال بشر حسو</orig>, as in Al-Ittihad Commercial Company (LLC) <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية (ذ.م.م)</orig>, as of September 30, 2023, amounts to KWD 7,478,380 <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> (seven million four hundred seventy-eight thousand three hundred eighty Kuwaiti Dinars).

Firstly: The Share Offered for Sale:
- A 49% share owned by the debtor, the heirs of Daniel Bishr Hasso <orig>دانيال بشر حسو</orig>, which represents a share in Al-Ittihad Commercial Company LLC <orig>الاتحاد التجارية ذ م م</orig>, valued at KWD 7,478,380 <orig>د.ك</orig> (seven million four hundred seventy-eight thousand three hundred eighty Kuwaiti Dinars).

Secondly: Auction Terms:
Firstly: The auction shall commence at the basic price indicated in the descriptions. Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of the price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
Secondly: The bidder whose offer is approved by the judge must deposit, at the time of the sale session, the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees.
Thirdly: If the bidder whose offer was approved fails to deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price; otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at their expense in the same session based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.
Fourthly: If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction will be awarded to them, unless in that session, no one comes forward to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by the deposit of the full auction price. In this case, the bidding will be reopened in the same session based on this price.
Fifthly: If the initial bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward with a ten percent increase, the bidding will be immediately reopened at their expense based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. In this session, no bid not accompanied by a full deposit of its value will be considered. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixthly: The successful bidder shall, in all cases, bear the fees and expenses of the company contract, and the expenses of the enforcement procedures, amounting to KWD 200 <orig>د.ك</orig>, as well as legal and expert fees, and the costs of advertising and publishing the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventhly: This announcement is published in application of the law, and bidders are requested for the sale procedures at their own responsibility, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
Eighthly: Partners have the right to object to the inclusion of the bidder who submitted the best offer within three days from the date the court approves their offer.
Ninthly: The company and any of the partners may - even before the auction is awarded - settle the debt of the debtor partner to the seizing creditors.
Tenthly: The company may - even before the auction is awarded - recover a portion of the seized shares to the extent sufficient to satisfy the creditor's debt.

Company Overview:
- Al-Ittihad Commercial Company <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية</orig> is one of the leading wholesale and retail trading companies and a major distributor in the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig>. Headquartered in Kuwait City <orig>مدينة الكويت</orig> with over 70 years of experience, Al-Ittihad Commercial Company <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية</orig> is a major retail and wholesale distributor for over 100 well-known international brands, offering a wide range of consumer, household, fashion, cosmetics, perfumes, and electrical goods. Brands include Gillette, Braun, Oral-B, General Air Conditioners, Jockey, Hanes, Wrangler, Parker, Prestige, Yardley, Halim Jazz, Philippa, and Chantelle.
- Al-Ittihad Commercial Company <orig>شركة الاتحاد التجارية</orig> was established in 1949 as a Limited Liability Company <orig>شركة ذات مسؤولية محدودة</orig> to engage in wholesale and retail trade activities under license number 1974/961 and commercial registration number 5530 dated February 16, 1971. The company's current capital is KWD 1,200,000 <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, and its main headquarters are located at Street 35, Capital - Qibla <orig>القبلة</orig>, State Commercial Center <orig>مركز الدولة التجاري</orig>.
- The commercial activity's revenues consist of five main sources: (sale of electrical appliances, sale of clothing, sale of home appliances, sale of personal care products, others). In 2019, the company achieved activity revenues of approximately KWD 21 million <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, and sales remained stable during the period, reaching approximately KWD 22.7 million <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> in 2022, despite the relative variation in revenue sources.
- Total operating costs increased from approximately KWD 15.5 million <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> in 2019 to approximately KWD 16.4 million <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> in 2022, with a slight decrease in the seized shares to the extent sufficient to satisfy the creditor's debt.

** According to the description certificate:
On 7/11/2021, the disputed property <orig>العين مثار النزاع</orig> was visited in the presence of Mr. Sa'ad Al-Daihani <orig>سعد الديحاني</orig>, the expert, guided by the plaintiffs' agent, while the defendants failed to appear. The inspection was carried out as follows:
The disputed property <orig>العين موضوع النزاع</orig> is located in Cordoba <orig>قرطبة</orig> area – Block 4 – Street 1 – Avenue 12 – Plot 748 – Automated Addressing Number (91717444).
The property is located on a single cul-de-sac street, bordered by neighbors on the right, left, and rear sides. It consists of a sunken basement <orig>سرداب ساقط</orig> fully open to the street from the front, used for parking 4 bays, each bay sufficient for two cars lengthwise.
It has two side entrances and a basement <orig>سرداب</orig> in the middle of the rear part of the house, lower than the parking level, as the parking is at the level of an enclosed courtyard <orig>حوش</orig>, and a staircase in the middle leads to that basement.
There is also a ground floor, first floor, and second floor, as the property from the rear middle is lower than the front half, with one apartment in the rear part, and the front part of each floor. Each floor has two apartments, but they are not at the same height level, as the front side of the house is elevated by approximately ten steps from the rear side.
There is also an elevator <orig>مصعد</orig> with front and rear doors, opening to each front and rear floor, with 6 stops. The plaintiffs' agent stated that each apartment contains 4 rooms, 3 bathrooms, a living room, and a kitchen.
The building's exterior cladding is old limestone, the property area is 524.5 m², the building condition is old but renovated internally, and the air conditioning is central.
Each apartment also has a balcony. The plaintiffs' agent stated that the flooring for each apartment is ceramic. The expert report notes that the side entrance to the right of the house is the used entrance leading to the apartments, and the other side entrance to the left of the property is merely a service entrance and courtyard <orig>حوش</orig>.
Secondly: Auction Terms:
First: The auction shall start at the basic price. Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of that price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
Second: Whoever's bid is approved by the judge must deposit the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees at the time of the sale session.
Third: If the bidder whose bid was approved does not deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price; otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at their expense in the same session based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.
Fourth: If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction shall be awarded to them, unless someone comes forward in that session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by a deposit of the full auction price. In this case, the bidding shall be reopened in the same session based on this new price.
Fifth: If the first bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward with a ten percent increase, the bidding shall be immediately reopened at their expense based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. No bid in this session shall be considered unless accompanied by a deposit of its full value. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixth: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the fees for transfer and registration of ownership, enforcement procedure expenses amounting to KWD 200 <orig>200 د.ك</orig>, legal and expert fees, and advertising and publication costs for the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventh: This announcement shall be published in application of the law and at the request of those initiating the sale procedures, and at their responsibility, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the Court of First Instance <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
Eighth: The successful bidder acknowledges that they have inspected the property in a manner that negates ignorance.
Notice: 1- This sale announcement shall be published in the Official Gazette <orig>الجريدة الرسمية</orig> in accordance with Article 266 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
2- The auction award judgment is appealable within seven days from the date of its pronouncement, in accordance with Article 277 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
3- The last paragraph of Article 276 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig> states that "If the person whose ownership was dispossessed is residing in the property, they shall remain in it as a tenant by force of law, and the successful bidder shall be obligated to draw up a lease contract in their favor at a fair market rent <orig>أجرة المثل</orig>."

*Examination
The expert proceeded to examine the property subject of the lawsuit, located in Khaitan <orig>خيطان</orig> – Block 10 – Street 8 – House No. 5 – Automated No. 12198712, with an area of 300m², in the presence of Mr. Sa'ad Al-Mutairi <orig>سعد المطيري</orig>, the study expert, and the third plaintiff, Ahmed Khatlan Khamis Hadian <orig>أحمد ختلان خميس هديان</orig>, personally, at the time of examination, as follows:
*The expert found, after inspection and examination and with the guidance of those present, the following, as the examination was conducted from the outside in the presence of the third plaintiff personally:
*The property is a private residence located on an internal street and bordered by neighbors on several sides.
*The building is old, with 3 parking spaces and 2 floors.
*Its cladding type is yellow Sigma, and it has 2 internal electrical and plumbing extensions.
*The floors are porcelain, the doors are iron, and the air conditioning type is units.
*The occupant of the property is the defendant Khalid Khatlan Khamis Hadian <orig>خالد ختلان خميس هديان</orig>.
*The knowledge expert took the property specifications in preparation for estimating its market value and submitting a special report on that.
*The expert decided to set a session for 2023/1/5 for the knowledge expert's report to be submitted and reserved the case for the report after being satisfied with what was presented before it.
Secondly: Auction Terms:
Firstly: The auction shall start at a basic price of 190,269 K.D. (one hundred ninety thousand two hundred sixty-nine Kuwaiti Dinars). Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of that price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
Secondly: Whoever's bid is approved by the judge must deposit, at the time of the sale session, the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees.
Thirdly: If the one whose bid was approved does not deposit the full price, he must deposit at least one-fifth of the price, otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at his expense in the same session based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.
Fourthly: If the bidder deposits the price in the next session, the auction will be awarded to him, unless someone comes forward in this session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by depositing the full auction price, in which case the bidding will be reopened in the same session based on this price.
Fifthly: If the first bidder does not deposit the full price in the next session and no one comes forward to bid with a ten percent increase, the bidding will be reopened at his expense based on the price at which it was awarded to him in the previous session, and no bid in this session will be considered unless accompanied by a deposit of its full value. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixthly: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the transfer and registration fees of ownership, enforcement procedure expenses amounting to 200 K.D., legal and expert fees, and advertising and publication expenses for the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventhly: This announcement is published in accordance with the law, and those directly involved in the sale procedures are requested to proceed at their own responsibility, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> at the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
Eighthly: The successful bidder acknowledges that he has examined the property with an examination that negates ignorance.
Notice: 1- This announcement of sale shall be published in the Official Gazette <orig>الجريدة الرسمية</orig> in accordance with Article 266 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
2- The auction award judgment is appealable within seven days from the date of pronouncement of the judgment in accordance with Article 277 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
3- The last paragraph of Article 276 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig> states that "If the dispossessed owner is residing in the property, he shall remain in it as a tenant by force of law, and the successful bidder shall be obliged to draw up a lease contract in his favor at a fair market rent."

# Auction Terms

First: The auction shall commence at the base price. Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of that price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.

Second: The bidder whose offer is approved by the judge must deposit the full price, expenses, and registration fees during the sale session.

Third: If the bidder whose offer was approved by the judge fails to deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price; otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at their expense in the same session, based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.

Fourth: If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction shall be awarded to them, unless someone comes forward in that session to overturn the purchase by increasing their bid by ten percent of the price at which the sale was awarded in the previous session. In this session, no bid unaccompanied by a full deposit of its value shall be considered, and the defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.

Fifth: If the initial bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session, and no one comes forward to increase the bid by ten percent, the bidding shall be immediately reopened at their expense, based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. In this session, no bid unaccompanied by a full deposit of its value shall be considered, and the defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.

Sixth: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the fees for transfer and registration of ownership, enforcement procedure expenses amounting to 200 K.D. <orig>د.ك</orig>, legal and expert fees, and advertising and publication costs for the sale in daily newspapers.

The subject of the dispute located in Al-Dhaher <orig>الظهر</orig> area - Block 2 - Street 3 - Avenue 21 - House 1 - Plot 41 - Automated address number 91057749. The inspection was carried out as follows:
1. The property subject to the dispute has an area of 278.92 m2, according to document number 2369 registered on 17/2/2009.
2. The property subject to the dispute is a government house located at the corner of two streets with a shared rear courtyard, bordered by a neighbor on one side. The exterior cladding is beige stone, and there are 8 shaded parking spaces.
3. The property subject to the dispute consists of a ground floor, a first floor, and a roof, with 3 entrances: a main entrance, a separate diwaniya <orig>ديوانية</orig> entrance, and a side entrance, with the following details:
    a- The ground floor consists of a hall with its bathroom + a room with its bathroom + a kitchen + a maid's room.
    b- The annex consists of a room with its bathroom + a diwaniya <orig>ديوانية</orig> with its bathroom.
    c- The first floor consists of 3 bedrooms + a hall + a bathroom + a main kitchen.
    d- The roof has a storage room and an air conditioning area.
4. Air conditioning units.
5. The first defendant stated that she resides on the first floor, while no one lives on the ground floor.
Secondly: Auction Terms:
First: The auction shall commence at the basic price indicated for the property. Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of that price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
Second: The bidder whose offer is approved by the judge must deposit the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees at the time of the sale session.
Third: If the bidder whose offer was approved does not deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price, and the bidding shall be reopened at their expense in the same session based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.
Fourth: If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction shall be awarded to them, unless someone comes forward in that session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by a deposit of the full price. In this case, the bidding shall be reopened in the same session based on this new price.
Fifth: If the first bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward to bid with a ten percent increase, the bidding shall be immediately reopened at their expense based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. In this session, no bid not accompanied by a deposit of its full value shall be considered. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixth: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the fees for transfer and registration of ownership, the expenses of enforcement procedures amounting to 200 K.D. <orig>د.ك</orig>, legal and expert fees, and the costs of advertising and publishing the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventh: This announcement is published in application of the law, and those directly involved in the sale procedures are responsible for them, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
Eighth: The successful bidder acknowledges that they have inspected the property in a manner that negates any ignorance.
Notice: 1- This sale announcement shall be published in the Official Gazette <orig>الجريدة الرسمية</orig> in accordance with Article 266 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
2- The auction award judgment is appealable within seven days from the date of its pronouncement, in accordance with Article 277 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
3- The last paragraph of Article 276 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig> states that "If the person whose ownership was divested is residing in the property, they shall remain in it as a tenant by operation of law, and the successful bidder shall be obligated to draw up a lease contract in their favor at a fair market rent."

# Announcement of Real Estate Auction Sale

The Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> at the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> announces the public auction sale of the property described below, on Monday, 15/9/2025 – Hall 50 – 8th Floor – at the New Palace of Justice <orig>قصر العدل الجديد</orig> at 9:00 AM – in execution of the court judgment issued in lawsuit No. 2023/717 Sales/1 <orig>بيوع/1</orig>.
From: Majed Ahmed Al-Basha <orig>ماجد أحمد الباشا</orig>
Against:
1- Bayariq Al-Nasr Commercial Establishment <orig>مؤسسة بيارق النصر التجارية</orig>, owned by Mr. Nasser Abdulhussain Sinaytan Al-Rashidi <orig>ناصر عبدالحسين صينيتان الرشيدي</orig>.
2- Nasser Abdulhussain Sinaytan Al-Rashidi <orig>ناصر عبدالحسين صينيتان الرشيدي</orig>.
3- Inaam Zaidan Al-Ahmad <orig>انعام زيدان الأحمد</orig>.

Description of the First Property: (According to the attached description certificate)
An undivided share <orig>حصة مشاعاً</orig> of 50% in residential unit No. 2-1-D – First Floor – Tower D – Model B – in the property under document No. 2018/3535, located in Sabah Al-Salem Suburb <orig>ضاحية صباح السالم</orig> – Plot No. 444 – Block 1. It includes parking spaces No. (11+12), with an area of 2,500m2 from plan No. 39423, and its area is 155.63m2. The amount is K.D. 81,000 (Eighty-one thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>) for the share offered for sale.

** And according to the expert's report:
The expert <orig>الخبيرة</orig> visited the property where the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> is located, in Sabah Al-Salem <orig>صباح السالم</orig> area, Block 1, Street 120, Plot No. 444, accompanied by Mr. Tareq Majed <orig>طارق ماجد</orig>, the knowledge expert <orig>خبير الدراية</orig> from the administration. The plaintiff's agent, the defendants, the second defendant (who is the owner of the first defendant establishment) personally, and the third defendant personally were present. The inspection was carried out as follows:
The inspection revealed that the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> is a duplex apartment, and the total area of the plot <orig>القسيمة</orig> is 4550m2, according to the letter from the Director General of Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> dated 26/6/2024, submitted within the defendants' document portfolio at the session on 4/8/2024. Document 2 shows the location and area of the plot where the subject of the dispute is located as 444. Document 3 states that the plot where the subject of the dispute is located is Building No. 4, Model D, consisting of a basement, ground floor, 10 upper floors, and a roof. Its exterior cladding is Sigma in grey and beige. The subject of the dispute is served by 2 elevators and 2 staircases. According to the statements of defendants 2 and 3, the floors consist of parking and services in the basement, services on the ground floor, and the upper floors are residential apartments and salons. The defendants also stated that there are shared services for the buildings, including swimming pools, small rooms for a health club, a children's club, prayer rooms <orig>مصليات</orig>, and a library.
The subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> is a duplex apartment with number 20497536, Model (B) D, located connecting the first and second floors, numbered 2-1-D. Access to the subject of the dispute is possible through two entrances, one on each floor. Its area, according to ownership document No. 2018/3535, submitted within the defendant's document portfolio at the session on 4/8/2024, document 3, is 155.63m2. There are 2 dedicated parking spaces for the subject of the dispute in the basement, numbered 11 + 12. The title deed <orig>سند الملكية</orig> was matched with the subject of the dispute and found to be correct.

*   Components of the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> according to the following details:
First Floor: Hall + 1 Room + 1 Bathroom + 2 Washbasins + 2 Bathrooms + Kitchen
Second Floor: 1 Room with an en-suite bathroom + 2 Rooms + Bathroom. And for the second floor
Its view of the first floor
*   Finishes of the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig>: ceramic floors, painted walls, gypsum board ceilings.
*   The air conditioning in the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> is central air conditioning.
*   Defendants 2 and 3 acknowledged that they are the beneficiaries <orig>المنفعة</orig> and possessors <orig>الحائز</orig> of the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig>, and the property is not leased and does not generate income.
*   Defendants 2 and 3 acknowledged that the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> is an independent private residence for them and their children, and the expert confirmed this.
Mr. Knowledge Expert <orig>خبير الدراية</orig> inspected the disputed property and took all his observations in preparation for preparing the report on the total valuation of the subject of the dispute <orig>عين النزاع</orig> and its quarter value according to the prevailing market price. However, Mr. Knowledge Expert stated that it is difficult for him to separately estimate the value of the land and the value of the existing buildings and structures for the subject of the dispute, as it is an apartment and not a separate building.

## Secondly: Auction Terms and Conditions:
Firstly: The auction shall start at the base price. To participate in the auction, at least one-fifth of that price must be paid by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Execution Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
Secondly: The bidder whose offer is approved by the judge must deposit the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees at the time of the sale session.
Thirdly: If the bidder whose offer was approved does not deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price. Otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at their expense in the same session, based on the price at which the sale was previously awarded.
Fourthly: If the bidder deposits the price in the current session, the auction shall be awarded to them, unless someone comes forward in the same session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by depositing the full auction price. In this case, the bidding will be reopened in the same session based on this new price.
Fifthly: If the first bidder does not deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward with a ten percent increase, the bidding will be immediately reopened at their expense based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. In this session, no offer not accompanied by a full deposit of its value will be considered. The defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
Sixthly: In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the transfer and registration fees for ownership, execution procedure expenses amounting to K.D. 200, legal and expert fees, and the costs of advertising and publishing the sale in daily newspapers.
Seventhly: This announcement is published in accordance with the law, and those directly involved in the sale procedures are responsible for them, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> at the General Court <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
Eighthly: The successful bidder acknowledges that they have inspected the property, and this inspection negates any claim of ignorance <orig>نافية للجهالة</orig>.

Notice:
1- This sale announcement shall be published in the Official Gazette <orig>الجريدة الرسمية</orig> in accordance with Article 266 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
2- The auction award judgment is appealable within seven days from the date of its pronouncement, in accordance with Article 277 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
3- The last paragraph of Article 276 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig> states that "If the person whose ownership has been divested is residing in the property, they shall remain in it as a tenant by operation of law, and the successful bidder shall be obligated to draw up a lease contract in their favor at a fair market rent <orig>أجرة المثل</orig>."

## Inspection:

## Second: Auction Terms:

1.  The auction shall commence with a base price of 400,000 KWD (Four Hundred Thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>). Participation in the auction requires payment of at least one-fifth of that price by a certified check from the drawee bank or by a letter of guarantee from one of the banks in favor of the Enforcement Department <orig>إدارة التنفيذ</orig> at the Ministry of Justice <orig>وزارة العدل</orig>.
2.  Whoever's bid is approved by the judge must deposit the full approved price, expenses, and registration fees at the time of the sale session.
3.  If the bidder whose bid was approved does not deposit the full price, they must deposit at least one-fifth of the price; otherwise, the bidding will be reopened at their expense in the same session based on the price at which the sale was initially awarded.
4.  If the bidder deposits the price in the subsequent session, the auction shall be awarded to them, unless someone comes forward in that session willing to purchase with a ten percent increase, accompanied by the deposit of the full auction price. In this case, the bidding shall be reopened in the same session based on this new price.
5.  If the first bidder fails to deposit the full price in the subsequent session and no one comes forward with a ten percent increase, the bidding shall be immediately reopened at their expense based on the price at which it was awarded to them in the previous session. In this session, no bid not accompanied by the deposit of its full value shall be considered, and the defaulting bidder shall be liable for any shortfall in the property's price.
6.  In all cases, the successful bidder shall bear the transfer and registration fees for ownership, enforcement procedure expenses amounting to 200 KWD, legal and expert fees, and advertising and publication costs for the sale in daily newspapers.
7.  This announcement is published in application of the law, and those directly involved in the sale procedures are responsible for them, without the Clerk's Office <orig>إدارة الكتاب</orig> of the Court of First Instance <orig>المحكمة الكلية</orig> bearing any responsibility.
8.  The successful bidder acknowledges that they have inspected the property with an inspection that negates ignorance (i.e., a thorough inspection).

### Notice:

2.  The auction award judgment is appealable within seven days from the date of its pronouncement, in accordance with Article 277 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig>.
3.  The last paragraph of Article 276 of the Code of Civil Procedure <orig>قانون المرافعات</orig> states that 'If the person whose ownership has been divested is residing in the property, they shall remain in it as a tenant by operation of law, and the successful bidder shall be obliged to draw up a lease contract in their favor at a fair market rent.'

Announcement of a Criminal Judgment
The Misdemeanor Court <orig>محكمة الجنح</orig> issued, in its session held on 11-02-2024,
in Case No.: 001972 / 23 – Commercial Affairs Prosecution, Misdemeanors, Checks <orig>نيابة شئون تجاري جنح شيكات</orig>
Police Station No.: ( 000053 / 23 – Al-Nafra <orig>النفرة</orig> ) –
Automated Case No.: 232953170
against the accused: Mohammed Yousef Salim Abdullah Othman <orig>محمد يوسف سليم عبدالله عثمان</orig>
Nationality: Kuwait <orig>الكويت</orig> Civil ID No.: 282042000605
an absentia judgment ruling:
sentencing the accused to three months imprisonment with labor and enforcement for the charge attributed to him.
The Public Prosecution <orig>النيابة العامة</orig> hereby notifies the convicted person of this judgment and instructs all security authorities to
enforce it in accordance with Article 188 of the Code of Criminal Procedures and Trials <orig>قانون الإجراءات والمحاكمات الجزائية</orig>, noting that
if a period of thirty-seven days, calculated from the second day of publication, passes without the convicted person appealing
by objection or appeal, the judgment becomes final and enforceable against him.
Director of Criminal Enforcement Prosecution

### Criminal Judgment Announcement <orig>إعلان حكم جزائي</orig>
The Misdemeanor Court <orig>محكمة الجنح</orig>, in its sessions held on 2022-02-22, issued
in Case No.: 006342 / 20 – Commercial Affairs Prosecution <orig>نيابة شئون تجارية</orig>
Police Station No.: ( / ) –
Automated Case No.: 201875480
Against the accused: Haroon Rasheed Kalloomal Ahmed <orig>هارون رشيد كاللومال احمد</orig>
Nationality: Not specified
Civil ID No.: 275051032136
an absentia judgment ruling:
to fine the accused five hundred Dinars <orig>دينار</orig> for the charges attributed to him, and ordered the closure of the violating establishment for one day.
The Public Prosecution <orig>النيابة العامة</orig> hereby notifies the convicted person of this judgment and instructs all security authorities to enforce it in accordance with Article 188 of the Code of Criminal Procedures and Trials <orig>قانون الإجراءات والمحاكمات الجزائية</orig>. ## Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>

### Announcement
Regarding the sale of electrical appliances – computers – office furniture – photocopiers – air conditioning units – various items (miscellaneous materials) by sealed envelope auction, out of use.

**Auction No. (2490)**

The Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> announces the sale of electrical appliances – computers – office furniture – photocopiers – air conditioning units – various items (miscellaneous materials) by sealed envelope auction, out of use, at the General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig>, according to the following details:
1- Location for receiving the terms and conditions booklet and auction participation offer: Procurement Secretariat Office <orig>مكتب أمانة سر المشتريات</orig> from 2025/8/17 to 2025/8/21. Documents are handed over for a non-refundable fee of (20) Dinars, payable into the General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig> fund.
The bidder will sign a declaration and undertaking upon receiving the terms and conditions booklet, committing to the specified deadline for submitting the offer to the Central Sales Committee <orig>لجنة البيع المركزي</orig> at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.
2- Inspection Date: (5) working days from 2025/8/17 – 2025/8/21. Inspection Time: During official working hours.
3- Location for receiving those wishing to inspect the auction items: Procurement and Warehouses Control <orig>مراقبة المشتريات والمخازن</orig>
4- Date for submitting offers and opening envelopes:
*   Submission of offers on Sunday, 2025/8/24, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Storage Affairs Department <orig>إدارة شئون التخزين العامة</orig> – Central Sales Section <orig>قسم البيع المركزي</orig>, according to the deadline set for the bidder by the General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig> (no offer will be accepted after the bidder's specified deadline).
*   Opening of envelopes and holding of the auction on Monday, 2025/8/25, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Storage Affairs Department <orig>إدارة شئون التخزين العامة</orig>.
*   Announcement of the successful bidder on the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> website on Monday, 2025/8/25.
*   Return of checks to unsuccessful bidders on Tuesday, 2025/8/26.
*   The certified check / bank guarantee must be submitted in the name of the General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig>.
*   Special Auction Conditions
1- The bidder must be Kuwaiti – an individual or a company – registered in the Commercial Register and with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>. Foreigners may participate provided they have a Kuwaiti partner or commercial agent with a notarized contract (must attach: copy of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry certificate, copy of the company license, copy of the civil ID. An authorized letter of authorization from the Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and all documents must be valid).
2- Kuwaiti individuals are permitted to participate in the auction (must attach a copy of the civil ID).
To receive the auction terms and conditions booklet: Contact Ms. / Ma'ali Al-Khalifa <orig>معالي الخليفة</orig>, Tel:
99653585
Inspection site official: Contact Mr. / Yaqoub Najm <orig>يعقوب نجم</orig>, Tel:
99988536
Central Sales Committee <orig>لجنة البيع المركزي</orig> at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> / Tel: (22481971).
Website address: www.mof.gov.kw
Undersecretary of the Ministry of Finance <orig>وكيل وزارة المالية</orig>

1- Location for receiving the terms and conditions booklet and auction participation offer: Ministry of Health <orig>وزارة الصحة</orig> – Financial Affairs <orig>الشؤون المالية</orig> – Central Archiving and Waste Section <orig>قسم الحفظ المركزي والمخلفات</orig> from 2025/8/17 to 2025/8/21. *   Opening of envelopes and holding of the auction on Wednesday, 2025/8/27, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> – Ministries Complex <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> – Block 12 – Third Floor – General Storage Affairs Department <orig>إدارة شئون التخزين العامة</orig>.

## Diwan of His Highness the Crown Prince <orig>ديوان سمو ولي العهد</orig>
### Announcement
The Diwan of His Highness the Crown Prince <orig>ديوان سمو ولي العهد</orig> announces the offering of General Practice No. (2025/3 - 2026) regarding the rental of (60) various service vehicles for the Diwan of His Highness the Crown Prince (without driver / without fuel). Specialized companies / establishments in this field are requested to review the Supply and Contracts Department (Contracts and Tenders Section) at the Diwan of His Highness the Crown Prince (Bayyan Palace <orig>قصر بيان</orig> – Administrative Building – Third Floor – ZONE.5) to obtain the documents for this practice for a fee of (300 K.D.) only three hundred Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, payable by (K-Net). Owners of small and medium enterprises are exempted from these fees, provided they prove it, bringing with them a copy of the practice announcement in the Official Gazette (Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>) and the following documents: -
1. Copy of the Ministry of Commerce and Industry <orig>وزارة التجارة والصناعة</orig> license.
2. Copy of the Commercial Register.
3. Copy of the civil ID for the establishment or company.
4. Copy of the company's articles of association (if any).
5. Copy of the valid registration certificate from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>.
6. Copy of the valid registration receipt with the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig>.
7. Copy of the practitioner's authorized signature.
8. Valid certificate from the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> regarding the percentage of national labor.
9. Authorization letter from the company / establishment to the person authorized to purchase the practice documents.
Please note that the last day to receive any inquiries is Tuesday, 09/09/2025, and the closing date (last date for submitting bids) is Tuesday, 16/09/2025, from (9:00) AM until (1:00) PM. The bid must be accompanied by a preliminary security deposit in the form of a certified check or a letter of guarantee issued by one of the banks accredited by the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> in the name of the bidder and in favor of the Diwan of His Highness the Crown Prince <orig>ديوان سمو ولي العهد</orig> for an amount of (6,870 K.D.) only six thousand eight hundred and seventy Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>. The preliminary security deposit and the bid must remain valid for (90) days from the date of opening the bids. Any bids not accompanied by the full security deposit or submitted after the aforementioned deadline will not be accepted. For inquiries, call 1800000 – Ext. 4401 – 4416 – 4415.
Undersecretary for Financial Affairs and Supply

# General Secretariat of the Supreme Council for Planning and Development <orig>الأمانة العامة للمجلس الأعلى للتخطيط والتنمية</orig>
## Announcement
The General Secretariat <orig>الأمانة العامة</orig> announces its desire to re-tender Auction No. (2-2025/2026-A) for the operation of a coffee shop in the General Secretariat building of the Supreme Council for Planning and Development <orig>المجلس الأعلى للتخطيط والتنمية</orig>. Companies wishing to apply for this auction must observe the following:
1. Be registered with the General Secretariat of the Supreme Council for Planning and Development <orig>الأمانة العامة للمجلس الأعلى للتخطيط والتنمية</orig> and listed with the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig> before the issuance of this announcement.
2. The applying company must have experience in this field, with proof thereof.
3. The General Secretariat <orig>الأمانة العامة</orig> will start issuing the auction terms from the date of publication of the announcement for a period of fifteen working days.
4. The auction terms can be obtained from the Financial Affairs Department <orig>إدارة الشئون المالية</orig> for a fee of K.D. 75/- (seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only).
5. A preliminary meeting with the bidders will be held on Monday, 25/8/2025, at 10:00 AM in the General Secretariat building of the Supreme Council for Planning and Development <orig>المجلس الأعلى للتخطيط والتنمية</orig>.
6. Offers must be submitted in a sealed envelope to the Financial Affairs Department <orig>إدارة الشئون المالية</orig> by 1:00 PM on Sunday, 7/9/2025.

### Announcement
Regarding the issuance of Purchase Order No. 9039 concerning the shipment of exhibits (Iraq Building Exhibition - land freight, World Food Moscow Exhibition - air freight, Food Africa Egypt Exhibition - air freight)
The Public Authority for Industry <orig>الهيئة العامة للصناعة</orig> announces the issuance of Purchase Order No. 9039 concerning the shipment of exhibits (Iraq Building Exhibition - land freight, World Food Moscow Exhibition - air freight, Food Africa Egypt Exhibition - air freight).
These documents can be obtained by visiting the website bids.pai.gov.kw starting from the date of this announcement's publication.

<table_caption>Tender Details for Purchase Order No. 9039</table_caption>
<table>
| Tender | Closing Date | Document Price | Initial Security Deposit | Preliminary Meeting |
|:------|:---|:---|:---|:---|
| 17/8/2025 | 21/8/2025 | 75 K.D. <orig>د.ك</orig> | 200 K.D. <orig>د.ك</orig> | None |
</table>

The deadline for submitting bids is Thursday, 21/8/2025, until 12:00 PM. Bids shall be delivered to the main headquarters of the Public Authority for Industry <orig>الهيئة العامة للصناعة</orig> (Second Floor - Supplies and Stores Department - Procurement Section) in an envelope bearing the name of the practice. Bids shall be valid for a period of (90) days starting from the date of opening the bid envelopes.
The bidder must submit a recent 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> stating that there is no suspension on the company's file regarding government contracts registered with the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>, and a 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate confirming the fulfillment of the national labor percentage, dated recently and contemporary to the bid date. The bidder must also deposit with their bid an initial security deposit in the form of a certified check or an unconditional, irrevocable, and reservation-free letter of guarantee issued in the name of the bidder by one of the banks accredited in the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> and in favor of the Public Authority for Industry <orig>الهيئة العامة للصناعة</orig>, valid for the duration of the bid. Any bid not accompanied by the full amount of this security deposit will be excluded. The initial security deposit may not be refunded until (90) days have passed from the closing date of the practice or when the winning bidder signs the contract, unless the practice is canceled. The Authority will not pay any interest on the amount of this security deposit, and the bidder's creditors may not seize its amount. Please note that this practice is divisible.

These documents can be obtained by visiting the website bids.pai.gov.kw starting from the date of this announcement's publication.

# General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>
## Announcement of Tender No. (2/2025)
Regarding the Implementation of the Media Campaign for the Twenty-Eighth Grand Kuwait Competition for Holy Quran Memorization and Recitation

The General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. (2/2025) regarding the implementation of the media campaign for the Twenty-Eighth Grand Kuwait Competition for Holy Quran Memorization and Recitation at the General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>.
This is in accordance with the special and general specifications and conditions contained in the tender documents, which can be obtained from the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>, Daiya Area <orig>منطقة الدعية</orig> / Block 6, Hamoud Al-Raqaba Street <orig>شارع حمود الرقبة</orig>, Second Floor - Financial Department <orig>الإدارة المالية</orig> - Procurement Section <orig>قسم المشتريات</orig>, during official working hours, starting from Sunday, 17/8/2025, for a non-refundable fee of (K.D. 150.000) (one hundred and fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only). Bids must be submitted to the General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig> before 1:00 PM on Thursday, 28/8/2025.
A preliminary meeting with the companies will be held at 10:00 AM on Thursday, 21/8/2025, at the headquarters of the General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>.
The initial guarantee for this bid is (2%) of the bid value and must be valid for the entire duration of the bid.
Those wishing to obtain the terms and conditions booklet are requested to bring the following documents:
- A copy of the company's previous work experience in contracting with government entities to implement similar media campaigns.
- A copy of the Commercial Register Certificate.
- A copy of the registration certificate with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig>.
- A copy of the Labor Support Certificate.
- A copy of the registration in the Suppliers Register at the General Secretariat of Endowments <orig>الأمانة العامة للأوقاف</orig>.

## Announcement (90 / 2025)
Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> announces the approval of the Municipal Council <orig>المجلس البلدي</orig> to reorganize a part of Sahibat Al-Mubarakiya <orig>صاحبة المباركية</orig> – (Plot 15, previously Bayan <orig>بيان</orig>), in accordance with the provisions of Decree-Law No. (40) of 1978 regarding the regulation of organizational plots, with the allocation of a 5-meter wide high-voltage power line path and the modification of the fuel station boundaries, provided that it retains its area of 9000 m² (nine thousand square meters), and the reorganization of some services such as (main transformer station, electrical transformers, shops, parking lots), as shown on the attached plan, subject to the following:
1. Approval of service ministries before issuing the final approval.
2. Adherence to the requirements stipulated in Ministerial Resolution No. (323/2023) regarding the rules and procedures related to the regulation of organizational plots, in implementation of the provisions of Decree-Law No. (40) of 1978 and Ministerial Resolution No. (693/2024) regarding the amendment of some provisions of Ministerial Resolution No. 325 of 2024.
3. Acceptance by specialized departments to relocate and modify the site and its area, not exceeding the prescribed areas, in case of conflict with any existing infrastructure services or any organizational requirements.
4. Cancellation of any previous decisions that contradict this.
Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> also invites stakeholders to submit their observations and objections, if any. A copy of this project has been displayed on the ground floor of the Main Municipality Building, as well as at the Hawalli Governorate Municipality Branch <orig>فرع بلدية محافظة حولي</orig> building, where the area containing the organizational plot is located. Stakeholders are given a period of (30) days from the date of publication of this announcement to review this project and submit any objections they may have, provided that these objections are submitted in writing to the Director General of the Municipality <orig>مدير عام البلدية</orig> during the aforementioned period.

# Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig>
## Announcement
Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> announces the offering of Practice No. (23-2025/2026) related to the automation and integration of Oracle <orig>أوراكل</orig> systems documentation. Interested parties wishing to submit their bids should refer to the Bank to purchase the booklet of terms and technical specifications for the aforementioned practice, according to the details specified below:

## Bid Conditions
The bidder must submit a technical offer and a financial offer in two separate envelopes, one for the technical offer and the other for the financial offer, ensuring to attach a copy of the bid on a flash memory, according to the following conditions:
- The technical envelope must contain the following:
- The preliminary security deposit in the form of a letter of guarantee for an amount of (1000 K.D.) "only one thousand Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>", unconditional, free from any reservations, and irrevocable, issued by one of the banks approved by the State of Kuwait <orig>دولة الكويت</orig> in its name and in favor of Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig>. This security must be valid for at least three months from the last date for receiving bids. Any bid not accompanied by the full security will be excluded. Preliminary security deposits may not be refunded until ninety (90) days have passed from the closing date of the practice, or when the winning bidder provides the final security and signs the contract, unless the practice is cancelled. Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> will not pay any interest on the amount of this security, and the creditor bidder may not seize its amount.
- General and special conditions and technical data for the submitted offer.
- Complete data on Kuwaiti <orig>كويتيين</orig> partners or subcontractors to whom a part of the execution may be assigned if the practice documents require it.
- Any other documents or data that the practice documents may require.
- The financial envelope must contain the following:
- The bid format, approved by the bidder.
- Price lists and quantity schedules.
- Any other elements that may affect the financial value of the offer according to the terms of the tender.
- Any other documents or data required by the practice documents.

## Location
Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> - Main Building located in South Surra <orig>جنوب السرة</orig> - Ministries Area <orig>منطقة الوزارات</orig> - Block 1
Plot 900023
Tel No.: 1810000, Sixth Floor.

## Review Times
From (8:30) AM until (01:00) PM.

## Booklet Purchase Fee
(75 K.D.) Seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only - non-refundable -.

## Required Documents
1. An authorization letter to purchase the booklet of terms and conditions, specifically for the designated purchasing officer, along with a copy of the civil ID, approved by the authorized signatory of the company, and providing us with a letter of approval for the company's authorized signatory, accredited by the Central Tenders Committee <orig>لجنة المناقصات المركزية</orig>.
2. Contact number for any inquiries related to the Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> Purchasing Committee <orig>لجنة الشراء</orig>.
3. A recent and up-to-date copy of the registration certificate with the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig>.
4. A recent copy of the practice offering announcement.
5. A recent and up-to-date copy of the national labor percentage determination issued by the competent authority.
6. A recent and up-to-date copy of the company's commercial registration certificate.
7. A recent and up-to-date copy of the registration confirmation certificate with the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة صناعة الكويت</orig>.
8. A valid 'To Whom It May Concern' certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>, stating that there are no restrictions on the bidder's file regarding government limitations registered with the Authority concerning one of the violations mentioned in Article (10) of Law No. (6) of 2010 regarding work in the private sector.
9. A copy of a recent and up-to-date certificate indicating registration with the Central Agency for Information Technology <orig>الجهاز المركزي لتكنولوجيا المعلومات</orig>.

## Preliminary Meeting Date
Monday, 2025/08/25, at the Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> main building in South Surra <orig>جنوب السرة</orig> area - Information Systems Center Department <orig>إدارة مركز نظم المعلومات</orig> - Meeting Room, at 11:00 AM.

## Last Date for Receiving Bids
Bids should be submitted in an envelope to Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> and deposited in the Bank's Purchasing Committee <orig>لجنة الشراء</orig> box at the Financial Department of Kuwait Credit Bank <orig>بنك الائتمان الكويتي</orig> no later than 1:00 PM on Sunday, 2025/09/07.
